title: Bioexperiment
description: Schema for submitting metadata for an assay with 1 or more replicates.
comment: An experiment is a special case of dataset. It includes assay metadata, replicate information and data files.

date_released.title: Date released
date_released.comment: Do not submit, value is assigned whe the object is released.

date_submitted.title: Date submitted
date_submitted.description: The date that the experiment received all required replicates and files
date_submitted.comment: Do not submit. date_submitted will be assigned only by DCC personnel.

possible_controls.title: Controls
possible_controls.description: Dataset that contain files that can serve as scientific controls for this experiment.

items.title: Control
items.description: A dataset that contains files that can serve as a scientific control for this experiment.
items.comment: See biodataset.json for a list of available identifiers. Exact pairing of data files with their controls is done using file relationships.

supersedes.title: Supersedes
supersedes.description: The experiment(s) that this experiment supersedes by virtue of being newer, better etc. than the one(s) it supersedes.

items.comment: See experiment.json for a list of available identifiers.

related_files.title: Additional data files
related_files.description: To be removed in a future release after data cleanup.

dbxrefs.title: External resources
dbxrefs.description: Identifiers from external resources that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with KCE objects.

items.title: External identifier
items.description: An identifier from an external resource that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with KCE objects.

documents.description: Protocols or other documents that describe the assay or the results (not data files).
